```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ISLR)
library(mlbench)
library(caret)
library(randomForest)
library(ranger)
library(gbm)
library(pdp)
library(pROC)
l<-load("D:/recovery.Rdata")
dat <- eval(parse(text = l))%>%
  mutate(study = factor(study))
dat <- eval(parse(text = l))
head(dat)
set.seed(5296)
data.1 <- dat[sample(1:10000, 2000),]


set.seed(5095)
data.2 <- dat[sample(1:10000, 2000),] 
```

```{r,wanring=FALSE}
reco.data<-rbind(data.1, data.2)%>%
  unique.array()
reco.data=reco.data[,-1]
```



```{r}
set.seed(2023)
trRows <- createDataPartition(reco.data$recovery_time,
p = .8,
list = F)

ctrl <- trainControl(method = "cv")
```


```{r}
# Try more if possible
rf.grid <- expand.grid(mtry = 1:14,
splitrule = "variance",
min.node.size = 1:6)
set.seed(1)
rf.fit <- train(recovery_time ~ . ,
reco.data[trRows,],
method = "ranger",
tuneGrid = rf.grid,
trControl = ctrl)
```

```{r}
ggplot(rf.fit, highlight = TRUE)
```


```{r}
gbm.grid <- expand.grid(n.trees = c(2000,4000,6000,8000,10000),
interaction.depth = 1:3,
shrinkage = c(0.005,0.01),
n.minobsinnode = c(1))
set.seed(1)
gbm.fit <- train(recovery_time ~ . ,
reco.data[trRows,],
method = "gbm",
tuneGrid = gbm.grid,
trControl = ctrl,
verbose = FALSE)
```

```{r}
ggplot(gbm.fit, highlight = TRUE)
resamp <- resamples(list(rf = rf.fit, gbm = gbm.fit))
summary(resamp)

```
